rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Thanks to all your efforts, we now have a ship
capable of withstanding even the longest voyage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Preliminary tests of the jump drive are
showing promising results.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0030
rows.name:
All that's left is to support those who have
not yet relocated to NLA,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0040
rows.name:
and to guide our current residents through
the necessary procedures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0050
rows.name:
If the Ghosts or Ganglion make a move,
or further dematerialization occurs,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0060
rows.name:
we have the ability to launch the White Whale 2,
even before all residents have boarded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0070
rows.name:
Naturally, we'll keep you apprised...
but we may be forced to make a snap decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0080
rows.name: So do be advised.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0090
rows.name:
Once everyone's safely on board,
it'll be time to go on the offensive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0100
rows.name: Yeah, it'll be all-out war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0110
rows.name:
Any more vessels to escort, and we wouldn't
have a snowball's chance of guarding them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0120
rows.name: But this way, there's a single point of failure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0130
rows.name:
Either way, if we lose the Ares,
we'll be dead in the water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0140
rows.name: Going all in?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0145
rows.name: I say bring it on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0150
rows.name: Changing the topicâ€”where will we be going to?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0160
rows.name: How are we supposed to know THAT?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0170
rows.name: Ideally, a new universe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0180
rows.name:
but we could also end up stranded inside the
Rift for the rest of time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0190
rows.name: Eeeeeep! Terror![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0200
rows.name:
Come what may, it seems we will be left
as happy as a pig in a blanket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0210
rows.name: You scared yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_JNK0010
rows.name: Stand Firm

rows.label: xs32200100_SEL0010
rows.name:
Smile and tell him you'll follow him
to the end of the world.

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0220
rows.name: Very heartfelt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0230
rows.name: Love ya too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_JNK0020
rows.name: Shudder

rows.label: xs32200100_SEL0020
rows.name: Admit to being terrified.

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0240
rows.name:
Nothing wrong with that.
Knowing fear is the first step to being brave, Rook.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0250
rows.name: Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0260
rows.name: Not to ruin the moment, but duty calls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0270
rows.name: BLADE named Kylie had a request concerning a friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0280
rows.name:
They've not made it to NLA yet.
Mind getting the full lowdown?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0290
rows.name: Of course, right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0300
rows.name: Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32200100_MSG0310
rows.name: She should be by the cathedral in the residential district.[ST:wait ]
